ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the reason the dose
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the reason the dose was adjusted?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: If there was a change in dosing, record the reason for change.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECADJ
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Captures reason dose was changed or modified. The reason may be chosen from a sponsor defined list (for example, adverse event, insufficient response, etc.) or entered as free text. May be used for variations from protocol-specified doses, or changes from expected doses. Used only when an adjustment is represented in EX dataset
